product.name: Swiss Madison SM-WC124 In Wall Bidet Carrier System
product.description: Necessary for wall-hung bidet installation the Concealed In-Wall Bidet Carrier is a durable and dependable choice. An adjustable steel frame allows a broad selection of mounting heights for bidets paired with it.
product.bullet_points:
• Concealed In-Wall Installation: This In-Wall System Allows For A Sleek And Stylish Look For A Wall-Hung Toilet.
• Steel Frame: Allows A Broad Selection Of Mounting Heights For Bidets Paired With It.
• Weight Capacity: 500 Pounds.
• Adjustable Height: When Installing The In-Wall Tank Carrier System, Adjust The Carriers Legs To Achieve The Desired Height Level.
• Part Of The Fantome B Collection, Explore Additional Products In This Collection To Complete The Room.
